title: The Department of Truth, Vol. 3: Free Country
description: Six acclaimed guest artists join Eisner winner JAMES TYNION IV (Something is Killing the Children, Batman) and MARTIN SIMMONDS (Dying is Easy) to uncover the deep, tangled roots of the Department of Truth…and Lee Harvey Oswald’s rise to its top position. From the Phantom Time Hypothesis to Mothman, find out what terrible secrets are waiting in the archives.Collects THE DEPARTMENT OF TRUTH #6-7, 14-17
author: James Tynion IV
